description: Delete a job production plan material type.
permissions: Allowed when the user can update the associated job production plan per JobProductionPlanPolicy (delegated by JobProductionPlanMaterialTypePolicy) and the material type can_delete is true.
side_effects: Deletes the job production plan material type when allowed.
validation_notes: --confirm is required. Deletion is blocked when the material type is associated with material transactions or segments, or when removing it would make a required-materials plan invalid.
